post.body: awesome! doing anything special today?
just within the past couple of weeks. we figured, why not?
very nice, i have been a big fan of Air since i listened to them on a long road trip cross-country a while back
great recommendations! i love tycho (thanks to you)
and @calculust are serving up an impromptu jam session while we work at the office. neat!
what kind of trouble? also, what browser/OS?
thanks!
you read my mind!
hope everyone's day is spectacular! everything's gonna be cool this christmas. http://tinysong.com/2z2g
hey! you! check out this video i made in memory of our moved-away former Shark: http://vimeo.com/2625007
ah, the holidays. time for over-consumption of food, alcohol, music, and family.
wow! flattered by the Grooveshark mention in CNN Tech Blog: http://tr.im/timewaster
fans of the 80s original Degrassi, check this out on Grooveshark: http://tinysong.com/2qdM
Challenge: find the most relaxing song in the world. Mine = http://tinysong.com/2x8l. what's yours?
A very special RIP to Majel Roddenberry: http://tr.im/computer. She will be missed.
Six trends for 2009: http://ow.ly/1aA. I like Feedback 3.0, but what do you guys think?
am i the only one in the world without a Spotify invite? anyone want to be my new BFF?
Lightspeed Champion covering Weezer? Yes, please. http://tinysong.com/1Wyn
apologies for any weirdness with playback over the last couple of hours. everything should be (mostly) good again!
Very, very special birthday wishes to our friend @fastest963!
